title: The tipping point: Service sector employees are more susceptible to mental health issues

title_detail.value: The tipping point: Service sector employees are more susceptible to mental health issues

summary: Service workers who rely on tips are at greater risk for depression, sleep problems and stress compared with employees who work in non-tipped positions. Strongest impact is to women who comprise 56 percent of all service workers.

summary_detail.value: Service workers who rely on tips are at greater risk for depression, sleep problems and stress compared with employees who work in non-tipped positions. Strongest impact is to women who comprise 56 percent of all service workers.
